dialogues.text: In the van, Peter laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wheee!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Van spins madly. The sedan skids and PLOWS into a store window. CRASH!! The kids cheer, triumphant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane scopes out the vault. The walls and ceilings are covered with high-tech weaponry. Mrs. Chun holds Julie. Bill waits impatiently. Shane is figuring his options...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anybody got any perfume?          Hair spray... breath freshener...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bewildered beat -- then Julie pulls out a tube of Binaca. Shane SQUIRTS it, revealing in the mist a myriad of crisscrossing LASER BEAMS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane steps forward. He speaks aloud, confidently:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoe, Todd, Lulu, Peter, Tyler!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bill reacts, puzzled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The key is the kid's names. Watch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane steps forward - ZAP! The floor tile SHOCKS HIM, sending him flying backwards. Bill laughs. Shane gets up, in pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think this is a game?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But... That was the code! I swear! I saw Plummer use it on his briefcase.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Code or no code, go get it -- now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ill cocks his gun. Sweat drips down Shane's face. He mists the air to see the beams: He steps forward, over one beam and ducking under another -- he miscalculates: a BURST OF FLAME blazes from the ceiling like a giant blow torch, Shane leaps back, landing on his hands and knees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Bill) You can't make him do this -- He doesn't have a chance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane's thinks. He notices a GROOVE carved in the floor, not quite centered to the room. He feels the Groove. Something she said...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (thinking) Haven't got a chance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane feels the Groove in the floor. He thinks. He looks up at the ceiling (bottom of the first floor).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sings softly to himself) ... When you're down and low, lower than the floor. And you haven't got a chance. Don't make a move `til you're in the groove, and do the Peter Panda Dance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane LAUGHS sharply. That's the code! He shares a look with Julie. Bill and Julie share a look -- they have no idea what he's laughing about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Calmness comes to Shane's face. He takes a deep breath,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: facing forwards:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just hop three times like a kangaroo --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hops forwards three times, fearlessly. NOTHING HAPPENS. No BOOBY TRAPS are set off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sidestep twice, just like the crabs do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He steps sideway, across two tiles. Again -- NOTHING HAPPENS. It dawns on Julie what he's doing. Julie smiles, relieved. Shane he steps forwards, then back:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three steps forward and one step back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When he steps back -- A SPRING-LOADED SPIKE launches down from the ceiling, imbedding itself where he was standing. Shane is rattled, his focus gone. Until Julie shouts:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUICK LIKE A TURTLE LIE ON YOUR BACK!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane snaps out of it and flops down on his back -- just in time: FLAMES SHOOT FROM BOTH WALLS right at him. If he'd been standing, he'd be toast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Minivan blasts through another yellow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look out Zoe! Rollers!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a POLICE CAR cruising the street ahead of them. Zoe blows past it. Inside is the Cute Cop. The Squad Car's lights flash on, and he catches up with the minivan -- it takes a while, they're FLYING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on. Use the gas, not the brake, 5-0.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoe slows down so the Police Car can pull up beside her. The Cute Cop shouts over at Zoe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd say you could lose your license -- but you haven't got one!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People are trying to kill us. They have my mom, and our bodyguard -- you have to follow me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just pull over!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine. Don't follow me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She swerves into the Squad Car, almost running it off the road. Zoe U-turns, and speeds back towards her house. The Squad Car turns around and chases her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Minivan speeds by. The Squad Car is on its tail. It is joined by MORE SQUAD CARS. Following the chase, at a safe distance, is Mr. Chun in his now-wrecked sedan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Murney and Claire are watching a SOCCER GAME.   He's in a NECK-BRACE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That Baloney Bandit struck again. I accept full responsibility. My intelligence proved to be faulty, but if I had more resources...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She shakes her head, Suddenly, the Minivan SPEEDS by. VROOOOM! Then the Police Car CHASES by. VROOOM!! Then --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (not that surprised:) I told you not to pass her in Driver's Ed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Claire frowns, concerned...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane is on the floor, sliding forward, nervously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wriggle like a snake `til you can't no more. Then better jump quick, like there ain't no floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane jumps up just AS THE FLOOR UNDER HIM DROPS AWAY, revealing a pool of liquid. Shane has wedged himself in the corner. A bead of his sweat falls into the liquid, and sizzles in a cloud of smoke. It's acid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to himself, to calm down) Almost done, almost done... "Just hold your breath, and jump to the left."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He jumps, to the left of the HOLE. He lands in front of THE SAFE. He's relieved -- then nozzles spray YELLOW GAS at him. He holds his breath just in time. Still holding his breath:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And that's the Peter Panda Dance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He flips the switch to DISARMED. The safe's red light turns green. Immediately, the flamethrowers and blowguns retract! The gas gets sucked into grates. The whole room goes SILENT. Whew.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bill looks around. He nervously steps forward - he waves his hand over the floor, and jumps back. Nothing happens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bill signals for Mrs. Chun to go first. She gestures back: you go. It's a stand-off. Finally, Bill takes a breath -- and walks across the room. The Booby Traps are disarmed. Mrs. Chun follows, pulling Julie along.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, Shane. You were always my best man. I knew you'd figure it out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane scowls, disgusted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, if you're willing to join up, I'd be happy to cut you in on the proceeds. What do you say -- we make a good team?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was devoted to you, sir. And you betrayed all of that. All that we stand for.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat.   Bill shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll take that as a "no."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bill turns to the safe. He starts to reach for the dial... then catches himself. Something's not right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... I think you better open it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane reaches for the safe, before he reaches the dial --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait. That's just what you want isn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bill thinks, trying to read Shane's poker face. Shane shrugs. Bill gestures to Mrs. Chun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You open it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mrs. Chun doesn't budge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh come on. I walked the floor first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reluctantly - Mrs. Chun reaches out, and touches the dial. Nothing happens. Relief. She turns it, and ZAPPPPP! 1000 volts ELECTROCUTES her, her hair on end, shaking from the voltage...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bill is off guard, Shane kicks his gun away! The gun skids into the acid and plunges, SIZZLING. Bill is incensed, but Shane gazes coldly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There will be no mercy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: None requested.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Full of himself, Bill LUNGES. And he's strong!     He shoves Shane back, then PUNCHES him in the gut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane glares, then returns an onslaught of BLOWS. Shane's fury is unleashed: A volley of attacks, hitting Bill's arms, head, legs! He's crazed, unrelenting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But suddenly Mrs. Chun LEAPS onto his back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AAAAAA!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She SCREAMS and grabs his throat. Shane struggles to lose her. Suddenly, he drops and FLIPS her. She catapults, stumbles backwards across the room, and stops just inches from the acid! She teeters, tottering, unable to gain her balance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane shakes his head, then runs to grab her outstretched hand. She smiles, saved. But he's unforgiving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a... terrible neighbor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane COLD-COCKS her, knocking her out. Suddenly --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane!   Watch out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bill is charging him.   Shane whirls, delivering a ROUNDHOUSE KICK. OOF!   Bill gets slammed in the chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bill tumbles, the wind knocked out of him. He jumps to his feet, delivering a series of hard punches, which Shane deflects -- they tangle like pro's. It's clear the both have the same training. They punch, spin, kick, connecting only occasionally. Bill wheels around and lands a kicks squarely in Shane's chest. Shane tumbles, landing on his back in front of the safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He steps over Shane. Leering mercilessly, he jabs the spike against Shane's throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any last words?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie gasps. Shane narrows his eyes, then whispers/sings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Say, good night, Peter Panda!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CODE! A BELL rings, and the safe door flies open! SLAMMING Bill in the head! BONG! Bill's collapses and drops. K.O.!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The minivan races toward the house.   The Police Cars chase after, SIRENS wailing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IN THE VAN, everyone is SCREAMING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoe! You're going too fast!! You're not gonna have enough time to stop-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, I'M the one in Driver's Ed!    I think I know what I'm doing!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She squeals into the driveway, then BRAKES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But it's too late. The van SKIDS, smoke BURNING from the tires -- and hits a tree. The Kid spill out and run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lead Police Car screeches to a stop.   POLICE leap from the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane and Julie stare at each other, then look in the safe:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside, the cavernous metal box holds but one object: A tiny COMPUTER CHIP. Shane gently removes it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... GHOST.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look in silence. She smiles at Shane, grateful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you Shane. It's finally over. Now we can go back to our peaceful...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then -- a sudden AMPLIFIED VOICE from behind them:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FREEZE! HOLD IT RIGHT THERE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Total commotion. The kids clamber from the van, with their hands raised. Cops surround them. Even Peter and Tyler have their little hands over their heads.   The garage door raises, Shane steps out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa, WHOA!    What are you doing to these kids??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FREEZE. HANDS WHERE I CAN SEE THEM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cops cover Shane and Julie, Julie and Shane Freeze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But, officer...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said FREEZE. Zoe, you're in a lot of trouble... Reckless endangerment! Driving without a license. Numerous, uh... trafficS violations --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (cutting him off) These kids are heroes. They just aided in exposing a high-level espionage ring. I suggest you call the FBI. Now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence. The Cops are unsure what to do. He scoffs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You expect me to believe any of that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly -- a CRAZED SCREAM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVERYBODY!   HIT THE GROUND!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone spins. Mr. Chun stands inside the gate, pointing a ROCKET LAUNCHER. He's disheveled and manic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I WANT THE GHOST, TEN MILLION DOLLARS, AND A DIRECT FLIGHT TO PYONGYANG!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cops freeze, helpless. Shane weighs his not so many options... Nobody is sure what to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But then -- a WOMAN suddenly flips over the fence, vaults onto Chun, and KNOCKS him out with a Karate Chop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ya!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Claire lands on her feet, triumphant. Even Chun is amazed, as he turns his head, Shane spins, and grabs the rocket launcher.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He breaks into a big grin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She proudly smiles back at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's flummoxed. This chaos is unsolvable.    Beaten, he reaches for his radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I'll call the FBI.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: F.B.I. AGENTS swarm the area. Bill and the Chuns are being hauled away in cuffs. Julie huddles with the kids. Shane talks with an F.B.I. Agent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Wolfe... that was nice work.   You're a one-man battalion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just doing my job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bureau is always looking for good men. Do you have a card or something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Agent hands him a BUSINESS CARD, then walks off. Shane examines it, swelling with pride.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Kids are looking around, watching the FBI Agents work. Lulu is following one of the FBI Agents around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you have to wear that thing in your ear all the time?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Does it itch?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoe is looking at the safe. She sees, fallen onto the floor, from the safe, a letter. Her siblings, and Julie notice, and gather around. Zoe reads the LETTER:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you're reading this, then Julie found the key. Julie, Tyler, Peter, Zoe, Todd, Lulu -- I want to say: I love you more than anything. I always have.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A tear comes to her eye. The Plummers hug each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Claire walks up to Shane. Mock-angry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So. What happens now? You'll be stationed somewhere else, right? I guess there's no more reason for you to stick around here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane looks at her. He looks around: at the family. He looks at Claire....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well. I'm kinda, re-conning the situation, here... And to tell the truth. I don't see anything but reasons to stay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So... What's the next move?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane smiles slyly and pulls her close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... I don't know. I'm on dry land. You're the superior office. You tell me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well. Summer's almost here. What if you and me did a little amphibious recon mission. On, say -- Maui?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir yes sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Claire beams. The Plummers all approach, interrupting. Zoe gives them a look -- that makes Shane and Claire BLUSH. Lulu turns to Shane, sad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is it. Your work here is through. Guess you have to go now...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She puts out her hand, to shake his.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, come here you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He surprises her with a BEAR HUG -- he hugs the whole family at once, squeezing them off the ground. He puts them down. Before he goes: he reaches down and gives Zoe - his medal. He squeezes her hand around it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He would've wanted me to give it to someone I care about. Like he did. Thank you. For everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Love you, Shane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is too much.    He wipes his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your dad would be so proud.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane bawls -- he can't keep it in. He starts to head off, Lulu calls after him:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane, we're never gonna see you again!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you talking about?      I'm gonna see you Friday night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A long beat.    Julie looks up, baffled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's Friday night?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Close on Shane:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tonight is the night we trained for, and failure is not an option! No detail is too small! We are the BEST! Remember your lines, hit your marks, and stay in character! I expect perfection!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (he grins) Now let's break a leg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wider reveals the Cast of `The Sound of Music'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane's military-march version of the musical. Nuns sing "How Do You Solve a Problem Like Maria?" The Von Trapp kids perform "So Long, Farewell."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the audience, Julie watches in astonishment. She is surrounded by her children. Scott: in a suit, his hair combed, Claire: dressed to the nines, the little Brownie Troop, even Murney. Lulu has a basket in her lap -- inside: GARY THE DUCK and his new family, the most adorable ducklings you ever saw.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all watch, rapt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You Are Sixteen begins. Shane watches with bated breath. Todd spins. In SLOW MOTION, he leaps into the SPIN KICK. It's fantastic -- a Michael Jordan dunk. The AUDIENCE goes nuts, Shane stands, and shouts:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YESSS! (And an Armed forces:) Huu-ah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Audience stares at him, until he sits back down, beaming with pride.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally: "CLIMB EVERY MOUNTAIN." Hearts swell, as the family crosses the papier-mch alps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A STANDING OVATION. The performers take their curtain calls, then giddily gesture Shane to come out. He humbly steps into view -- and the house goes crazy. Thundering applause. A cellophane bouquet of flowers gets thrust on him. Shane smiles, touched. Mission accomplished.
